channel.title: Project Texscape
channel.description:
/* I am not going to explain much, as I am limitting this thread so there won't be much */ Thread Mode: Modification In Action omg brb
You have just entered a thread called Texscape, The Project. My projects goal is to become successful at all cost & have a whole ecomeny of an organized group. Below is our Network Resources that explains how things are organized & I would prefer others to use it if they wanted although You would have to change certain things around and also you dont gotta give credit:
[center][IMG]http://i11.tinypic.com/61knbd3.jpg[/img][/center]
I am a Applicant: NameHere - Applying for JobName & I agree to your terms & rules with my signature added to let you know I read all of the rules carefully examining them: NameHereAgain and here is my email for contact: Emailhere.
[code]I am a Applicant: NameHere - Applying for JobName & I agree to your terms & rules with my signature added to let you know I read all of the rules carefully examining them: NameHereAgain and here is my email for contact: Emailhere.[/code]
[hr]
In-Thread Rules: No Spamming, cursing, arguing, giving support. Do Aplly for a job only.
Texscape Rules for Employees: No Arguing, Being late for work, leaving group as soon as you change your mind & checking in at work without checking in at executive. Do be on time, listen to your advisor, remember your ID & pay attention to announcements by advisors.
Terms of Texscape Leaving: [size=8pt]You will have to make a choice weather your staying or not, this is why most of our applicants are students meaning we are not to depend on them as well. They have to make a job positon for themself prooving that they will stay in there trial as a student programmer.[/size]
Cussing: [size=8pt]Everying is forbidden to cuss in the chat room while on the job[/size]
[hr]
[b][size=9pt]Founder[/size][/b] [s]Full[/s] [size=8pt]The Founder is above all Communications (The Network Tree). The Founder can do anything he want with his business, mean he can fire, replace another Communication with others, swap Communications. He can do ANYTHING he desires.[/size]
[b][size=9pt]Supervisor[/size][/b] [size=8pt]1st special client out of 3 who is to make sure everyone is doing there job right. If someone is to be caught, they are to be warn or executed from Tex depending on what they have done & how bad it is. If you are apllying for this job, then you are to take a test as a EXE student.[/size]
[b][size=9pt]Executive[/size][/b] [size=8pt]2nd special client out of 3 who manages Communication Network to keep things more organized. They take ID check-in from the Communications below there rank, but if the Communication client doesn't follow the rules they contact there advisor. If you are applying for this job, then you are to take a test as a EXE student. [/size]
[b][size=9pt]Council[/size][/b] [size=8pt]3nd special client of the 3 that checks on the Communication client to see if they are the right person fit for that job. Checking for evidence of proof that the client can do the desired Communication the he or she is applying for.Councils will always check to see if someone can do there desired job currectly & see if they have the currect skills for it.[/size]
[b][size=9pt]Server Programmer (Coders)[/size][/b] [size=8pt]Programmers goals are to be very uniqe, although they are split into two different sections:
[size=7pt][b]Server Programming[/b][/size] Server programmers are to accomplish a new goal within 2 weeks. There are groups though, so you will have to be in contact at all times. Expert or intermedian Java Programmers are allowed for this job though.
[size=7pt][b]Client Programming[/b][/size] Client Programmers will update the web client on each release meaning if we update the server, the client should be ready and already made into a jar file. ONLY expert or intermedian programmers are allowed for this job.
[i]You will be PMed a test once you apply for your job, a council will check your test & confirm the results to it, but you are to be assigned to 10 questions through the 3 ID test. If you make atleast 150 score on it, you will be assigned as a intermedian programmer - 240/300/300+ above or close will represent as a expert programmer.[/i][/size]
[i]More is being writen for this, please be patient...[/i]

item.title: Project Texscape
item.dc:creator: @Jay_Laze .Jay Laze
item.description:
@Jay_Laze wrote:

Not yet, Im waiting for my Co Founder to document it. Once we get that straight were going to post pone other jobs & only recruit for Executives, Supervisors & Councils which is a easy job for anyone to do.

Read full topic

More is being writen for this, please be patientâ€¦
